column1: SAW CANADA GEESE- MALLARDS- + RED WINGED BLACKBIRDS
SAW 3 SNAPPING TURTLES-1 BIG-16 IN DIA SHELL

column2: SAW LOTS OF PAINTED TURTLES-20 ON 1 LOG!

column1: LOTS OF WHITE WATER LILIES IN BLOOM
A FEW LEAVES ARE STARTING TO CHANGE COLOR

column2: rainy- cloudy weather made it difficult to get out this month-first time this year!
kayaking with my friend Roger Davis
hundreds of white water lilies in bloom!

column1: TRILLIUMS AND MARSH MARIGOLDS IN BLOOM
LOTS OF POLLEN ON THE WATER
YELLOW + WHITE WATER LILIES IN BLOOM

column2: saw a huge snapping turtle (shell 24" +/-) sunning itself on a log!
partly cloudy with a light wind
SUNNY + CALM.  DAM SPILLWAY IS OPEN
SUNNY- COOL- + CALM.  SAW TWO BALD EAGLES.
CLEAR- COOL- WITH RIPPLES ON SURFACE
CLEAR- MILD- AND CALM.  BLUE-GREEN ALGAE SCUM AT SHORELINE
PARTLY CLOUDY- STEADY BREEZE- + 6" WAVES.  SOME BLUE-GREEN ALGAE AT SHORELINE.

Sunny + calm.  Red Maples leafing out and Juneberry and Marsh Marigold blooming. Turtle bonanza today- saw 2 huge Snapping Turtles- 3 Spiny Softshells- and dozens of Painted Turtles while kayaking in the river.
Sunny and calm.  Water is high-dam releasing water. Blue flags are blooming.
Partly cloudy and calm.  Saw lots of wildlife (5 deer- 2 Bald Eagles- and a Great Blue Heron) while kayaking the river.
Partly sunny and calm.  Water high-dam releasing water.  Caught in rain storm while kayaking the river and had to sit it out for about a half hour in the cabin.
Partly cloudy with light breeze.  Water level high in the river.  White Water Lilies in full bloom.  Some Purple Loosestrife blooming also.
Sunny + calm.  Dam releasing water.  Water depth with secchi=21 ft.  Geese fouling my kayak launch site at the dam!
Partly sunny- moderate breeze- and 4-6 inch waves.  Dam releasing water.
Partly cloudy and calm.  My grandson- Tristan- visiting this week.
Clear + calm.  Cool dry air for a change.  Hope fall is here.  Dam releasing water.
Partly cloudy with light breeze.  Lots of people on the river - 4 kayakers.  Usually I am the only one on the river.
Sunny with moderate breeze.  Leaf color is muted and late this year- just starting.
Clear- mild- and breezy.  Fall leaf color is at its peak.  Last reading of the season.
WHITE WATER LILIES IN FULL BLOOM
